title: Brigt Rykkje
text: Brigt Rykkje (born 16 June 1975) is a Dutch and Norwegian <a href="speed%20skating">speed skater</a>. He was born in <a href="Bergen">Bergen</a> to a Dutch mother and Norwegian father, and grew up in the Netherlands. He is the brother of <a href="Bjarne%20Rykkje">Bjarne Rykkje</a>. He competed for Norway at the <a href="1998%20Winter%20Olympics">1998 Winter Olympics</a> in <a href="Nagano%2C%20Nagano">Nagano</a>. He has competed for both Norway and the Netherlands at the <a href="World%20Single%20Distance%20Championships%20for%20Men">world championships</a>.
